Description:
Detects an issue in apache logs that reports threading related errors

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Apache Threading Error
Query: eql select * from _source_ where Query('__pthread_tpp_change_priority: Assertion `new_prio == -1 || (new_prio >= fifo_min_prio && new_prio <= fifo_max_prio)')
